jmines.control.listeners
Class MouseListenerForGamePanel

java.lang.Object
  jmines.control.listeners.MouseListenerForGamePanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, EventListener, MouseInputListener
public class MouseListenerForGamePanel
extends Object
implements MouseInputListener

The listener to use to listen the mouse event and mouse moves in the game panel.

Author:
Zleurtor
